text: Who is widely considered the first computer programmer?
hint: This person wrote theoretical programs for the Babbage mechanical computer

text: What was the name of the first programmable electronic general purpose computer?
hint: This device was designed for numerical computation

text: What was the first compiled high-level programming language?
hint: This programming language is still in use today, although very rarely

text: Which programming language was created by Netscape to add dynamic behavior to web pages?
hint: Unlike a language with a similar name, this one wasn't used to write Minecraft

text: Who is considered the inventor of the World Wide Web?
hint: This English Computer scienctist is still alive today and doesn't have a penchant for naming things after himself.
